content.body: Potential footguns involving operators: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-amount/issues/71. `amount++` is an interesting one. We should probably document how all the operators interact with Amount.
content.formatted_body: Potential footguns involving operators: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-amount/issues/71. amount++ is an interesting one. We should probably document how all the operators interact with Amount.
